summary: "Happy Days" is an American TV sitcom that aired from 1974 to 1984. It's about life in the 1950s and 1960s Midwest, starring Ron Howard as Richie Cunningham and Henry Winkler as Fonzie. At first, it was just okay, but when the show focused more on funny moments and made Fonzie a main character, it became super popular. It even spawned other shows like "Laverne & Shirley." The series had 11 seasons and 255 episodes.
title: Happy Days
